did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The collection includes 21 sermons, 10 letters and 6 poems.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Charles Morford lived in Victor, N.Y. (Ontario County) from 1816 until his death in 1849.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The collection includes 21 sermons, 10 letters and 6 poems.

Christian poetry, American
